meanings.sent1: The actor playing the hero was hunky and caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: She thought the new student was hunky and had a crush on him.
meanings.sent3: The hunky lifeguard made sure everyone was safe at the pool.
meanings.sent4: The hunky model strutted down the runway, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The hunky firefighter saved the kitten from the tree with ease.

meanings.sent1: After months of training, he became hunky and could run faster.
meanings.sent2: The athlete was hunky and ready for the upcoming competition.
meanings.sent3: The hunky chef effortlessly carried the heavy pots around the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The hunky dancer moved gracefully on stage, impressing the audience.
meanings.sent5: The hunky soldier completed the obstacle course with great speed.

meanings.definition: A person who is strong and muscular
meanings.sent1: The gym trainer was a hunky who helped others build their muscles.
meanings.sent2: She admired the hunky at the gym who lifted weights effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The hunky in the action movie defeated the villains with his strength.
meanings.sent4: The hunky wrestler dominated the ring with his powerful moves.
meanings.sent5: The hunky bodybuilder won the competition with his impressive physique.
